General.Name: Jonjee Hi-tech Industrial and Commercial Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Jonjee Hi-Tech Industrial and Commercial Holding Co.,Ltd produces and sells seasoning products in China and internationally. The company's products include soy sauce, chicken powder, oyster sauce, sauce, cooking wine, vinegar, edible oil, fermented bean curd, juice, hot pot base, and other seasoning products. It also provides property services, gardening, and housing brokerage services. In addition, the company engages in the property management, property leasing, property services, and various professional consulting services, as well as provides cleaning and greening maintenance services, security services, property maintenance and custody services, and consulting services. Further, it is involved in manufacturing and sale of precision forgings and machined products for automobiles and motorcycles. The company was formerly known as Zhongshan Torch Hi-tech Industrial & Commercial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jonjee Hi-Tech Industrial and Commercial Holding Co.,Ltd in February 2001. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Zhongshan, China.
